column2: Workload is spread over the whole team (one team member is often Xtimes more productive than the others...but nevertheless, here is a track record that everyone is contributing a lot)

column5: A total of 369 commits can be seen

column2: Number of commits: by different people
column5: A good amount of different user commits between september and november
There aren't a lot of issues that were reported

column2: Docs: doco generated, format not ugly
Docs: what: point descriptions of each class/function (in isolation)
column5: Most of the codes have descriptions. But there are a few exceptions where description is missing.

column2: Docs: how: for common use cases X,Y,Z mini-tutorials showing worked examples on how to do X,Y,Z
column5: Old version has good tutorials but the new version doesn't.

column2: Docs: why: docs tell a story, motivate the whole thing, deliver a punchline that makes you want to rush out and use the thing
column5: A combination of video + words used to describe the tool.

column2: Docs: short video, animated, hosted on your repo. That convinces people why they want to work on your code.
column5: Short video available but not extremely attractive

column2: The files CONTRIBUTING.md lists coding standards and lots of tips on how to extend the system without screwing things up
Issues are discussed before they are closed
column5: Coonsiderable amount of issues have comments before getting closed

column2: Test cases: a large proportion of the issues related to handling failing cases.
Evidence that the whole team is using the same tools: everyone can get to all tools and files
Evidence that the whole team is using the same tools (e.g. config files in the repo, updated by lots of different people)
Evidence that the whole team is using the same tools (e.g. tutor can ask anyone to share screen, they demonstrate the system running on their computer)
Evidence that the members of the team are working across multiple places in the code base

column5: Only three releases noticed in the repo and the last release was two years ago
